ADHD is a neurological disorder due to an imbalance of dopamine and noradrenaline neurotransmitters in the brain.

text:
Neurodiversity awareness helps a lot in self management. 

For example, I used to read a text and then change to another app, meaning to go back to it, then frustrate because I forgot to reply. 

Now I exit the app knowing I might forget but willing to risk it anyway.

text:
Neurodiversity = the idea/movement that neurological differences should be societally/socially recognized, accepted, and respected just as any other human variation.

Neurodivergent = not neurotypical—those with neurological conditions such as ADHD, ASD, dyslexia, etc
tokenized_text: idea movement neurological differences societally socially recognized accepted respected human variation neurotypical neurological conditions adhd asd dyslexia etc

If we move away from the idea of neurodiversity as disabiity justice, then we move away from what makes real change, from what works, from what we need, from who we are.

text:
Self-stimulating behaviours or ‘stimming’, are a vital control and calming mechanism for neurodiverse people. It should never be discouraged - yet my daughter was moved down a set at school because ‘we don’t expect set 1 pupils to fidget’. 🤦🏼‍♀️
